mdRecord.dcterms:title: Fiduciary Accounts: Guardianship of Henry A. Bishop
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Guardianship of Henry A. Bishop Elisha Reed, Guardian until he resigned on 01.11.1887 L. C. Duncan, New Guardian Recorded in Ledger Book 3, page 77, in Floyd County Courthouse

mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: The Circuit Court of Floyd County
